summary: TRANSMISSION SHIFTS OUT OF DRIVE TO NEUTRAL GEAR.   I FOUND A TECHNICAL SERVICE BULLETIN #677164 WHICH THE DEALER SAID WAS NOT A RECALL NOTICE AND WOULD NOT HONOR IT.  THE NOTICE STATES TO REPAIR THE CONTROL VALVE BODY ASSEMBLY.  THE POWER LOSS RESULTED IN A REEVE OF THE ENGINE AT 70 MILES PER HOUR ON INTERSTATE 10 IN ARIZONA AND ALSO WHILE DRIVING LOCALLY OFF HIGHWAY 101 AT 65 MILES PER HOUR.  THE CAR GEARS SHIFTED OUT OF DRIVE INTO NEUTRAL GEAR.  THIS NEEDS TO BE RECALLED BEFORE IT CAUSES INJURY. TS
